revision.text: In the following tables, '''Bolded''' names indicate Pokémon that can be obtained in their respective regions by either hatching shop eggs or through [[Berries#Wandering_Pokémon|Wandering Pokémon]] on the [[Farm]]. '''''Bolded and Italicized''''' names indicate Pokémon that can only be obtained in their respective region by hatching shop eggs. '''''<u>Bold, Italicized, and underlined</u>''''' names indicate Pokémon that cannot be obtained outside shop eggs (ie can't find it wild in a later region even with Require Complete Pokédex challenge off) as of v0.8.15
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
